title: Idea for new 120 AP item
body:
Essentially it's been confirmed that there will be a 120 AP item to replace the loss of DFG and I had an awesome idea for a replacement and looking for opinions.

> [ITEM NAME]
> Builds from:
> {{item:3140}} {{item:1058}} 
> Quicksilver sash + Needlessly Large rod
> 1250 + 1600 = 2850
> 3700 cost
> 
> Description:
> 120 Ability Power
> 35 Magic Resist
> 
> UNIQUE PASSIVE: Dealing damage to enemy units via spells and abilities increases movement speed by 20 (aoe and dot makes it 10)
> UNIQUE ACTIVE: removes crowd control effects and gives a 10% (maybe 15%) damage reduction for the next 3 seconds

So essentially my thoughts behind this item is:
1. There's no mage option for QSS at the moment and a LOT of midlaners have hard CC
2. The movement speed passive acts somewhat as a mage option for phage (Theres the mirrors of other items: {{item:3074}} {{item:3085}} , {{item:3100}} {{item:3078}} , {{item:3022}} {{item:3116}} , {{item:3172}} {{item:3115}} AND SO ON)
3. The % damage reduction (possibly even a shield) is a nice little addition because 100% of champions that hit you with hard CC will use damage abilities aferwards ({{champion:103}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:101}} AND SO ON)

So please, thoughts?

- harrysurf

replies.body: Althought i would love a 120ap qss item, i think riot would not make this due to the reason there is already a defensive 120ap item, zhonyas. If riot want to make a 120ap mr item, sure that would be ok but with qss might be a little over powered. I think riot will try and introduce a safe item that lets you have a safer approach as a first item so you can farm your lane and get into the mid game. not sure what riot thinks though
Ok so I've gathered people don't like the QSS aspect but what about the move speed?
People keep talking about a QSS item for AP, but I think if we get one we would need to remove Hourglass. Having both would be too much in my opinion.

Well you can actually say and I think some rioters agree that having zhonyas is already like a mercurial scimitar. Having yet another ap survivability may be overkill considering ad doesn't have one either. I was even thinking about possibly a essence reaver ap item going of like spell vamp rather than lifesteal
Interesting thought actually, I hadn't thought about something like that and essence reaver is still fairly new and has been quite popular.
